channel.title: Assembly on RD's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Assembly on RD's Blog

item.title: Structure-Function of the Multifunctional Ca2+/Calmodulin-Dependent Protein Kinase II (CaMKII)
item.description: Notes on a 2002 JBC review dissecting CaMKII’s structure-function relationship, covering autoinhibition, isoform diversity, holoenzyme assembly, autophosphorylation, subunit exchange, and Ca2+/CaM frequency decoding — a foundational reference for understanding this multifunctional kinase as a calcium signal integrator.
